policyname: Warehouse owners can view their jobs
Users can view their verification requests
qual:
((requested_by = auth.uid()) OR (job_id IN ( SELECT j.id
   FROM jobs j
  WHERE ((j.warehouse_owner_id = auth.uid()) OR (auth.uid() IN ( SELECT broker_details.user_id
           FROM broker_details))))))

policyname: Users can create verification requests

   FROM jobs
  WHERE (jobs.assigned_driver_id = auth.uid()))))

policyname: Jobs are viewable by warehouse owners who created them
qual:
((auth.uid() = warehouse_owner_id) AND (EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM profiles
  WHERE ((profiles.id = auth.uid()) AND (profiles.role = 'warehouse_owner'::user_role)))))
